title: Domain Created Event Schema
description: Schema for the DomainCreated event published when a new domain is successfully created

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the domain was created

agent_id.description: Unique identifier of the domain collection agent

session_id.description: Unique identifier for the collection session that created this domain

name.description: Unique domain name following CIM naming conventions

purpose.description: Clear description of the domain's purpose and scope

cim_graph_path.description: File path to the generated CIM graph for this domain

environment.description: CIM environment where the domain was created

domain_definition_path.description: File path to the domain definition YAML file

nats_streams.description: NATS JetStream streams created for this domain

version.description: Version of the domain collection agent

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the domain creation

files_created.description: List of files created for this domain

streams_initialized.description: Whether NATS streams were successfully initialized
